summary: A retexture of the large Dibella statue in 4k and 2k
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b]LARGE DIBELLA STATUE
[size=5][b]4K-2K[/b][/size]
[color=#999999][size=3]reTexture[/size][/color][/b][/size]
[color=#999999]_______________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/62926-1-1424629245.png[/img]

[size=4]ENB
[color=#999999][size=3]used in screenshot[/size][/color]:[/size]
[color=#999999][size=4][color=#999999]_________________________________________ __  _[/color][/size][/color]

Serenity ENB
by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6440158]prod80[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62411/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62411/?[/url]

[size=4]
MOD INFO:[/size]
[color=#999999][size=4][color=#999999]_________________________________________ __  _[/color][/size][/color]
This is a simple Dibella statue reskin for the large version held in 'Markarth' Dibella temple,
giving Dibella a different look.[/center]

[center][size=4][size=4]R[size=4]EQUIREMENTS:[/size]
[color=#999999]_________________________________________ __  _[/color][/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=2]None[/size][/color]

COM[size=4]PAYIBILITY:[/size]
[color=#999999]_________________________________________ __  _[/color]

[size=2][color=#00ff00]No issues[/color], unless you have [u]another texture[/u] mod
then it's a matter of [u]installation order[/u].[/size]

INSTALL:[/size]
[size=4][color=#999999]_________________________________________ __  _[/color][/size][/center]
[b][color=#ff7700]Non[/color]-Nexus mod manager:[/b]
- Drag and drop 'Textures' into
dir:'\\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data' the 'Data' folder.
[color=#999999](backup & replace previous if any/needed)[/color]

[b][color=#BF9000]Nexus mod manager[/color]:[/b]
- Select
'Large Dibella Statue Texture 4k ver 1.0.1' or
'Large Dibella Statue Texture 2k ver 1.0.1'
and hit the [color=#00ff00]Green Plus[/color].

[b][color=#BF9000]Nexus mod manager[/color] ([color=#ff0000]Offline[/color]):[/b]
- Drag and drop
'Large Dibella Statue Texture 4k ver 1.0.1' or
'Large Dibella Statue Texture 2k ver 1.0.1'
into dir:    '\\Nexus Mod Manager\Skyrim\Mods'
or how-ever you've installed Nexus mod manager.

(If Nexus mod manager is [u]running [/u]at the time of transfer, [u]restart Nexus mod manager[/u] after the file transfer.)

[center][size=4]TOOLS:[/size]
[size=4][color=#999999]_________________________________________ __  _[/color][/size][/center]
[list][*]FO3Archive Texture extraction (and Mesh)[/*]
[*]Cgtextures Additional texture[/*]
[*]Gimp 2.8 Image editor [/*]
[*]NifSkope Convertion from .Nif -to- .obj[/*]
[*]Crazybump 1.2(demo) Generating Normal and Specular map (Mesh .obj for preview loaded)[/*]
[*]WinRar Packing files[/*]
[/list]
author: Uraxz
